explains: v. 观察；遵守；注意到；庆祝（observe 的过去式与过去分词）
wordGroup: observed value 观测值；测定值

sentences.en: Have you observed any changes lately?
sentences.cn: 最近你注意到什么变化没有？

sentences.en: The police observed a man enter the bank.
sentences.cn: 警察注意到一个男人走进了银行。

sentences.en: The patients were observed over a period of several months.
sentences.cn: 这些病人被观察了数月之久。
